CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C03

TI_TEXT.P: Servicii de învăţământ şi formare profesională

TITLE.P: Contracted Training Services — Provision of Contracted Training Services to Kerry Education and Training Board (KCETB).

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kerry ETB invites tenders to the Request for Tender (RFT) from private training providers for the provision of the services as described in Appendix 3-Course Details. The services concerned will primarily be required at Kerry ETB Training Centre but may occasionally be required at other further education and training centres or community settings in Kerry. The services envisaged by Kerry ETB over the duration of the contract are detailed in the 12 lots. Maximum number of learners is 20 per Lot.
Providing training for the following modules.

AC_QUALITY.AC_CRITERION: Relevant experience in delivering similar courses in the last 2 years
Methodology for Quality Assurance including systems for managing courses
Lead Tutor Qualification & Experience
Methodology for assisting learners obtaining relevant work/job placement

AC_COST.AC_CRITERION: Pricing — Total price of delivering/management of the course and rental of premises
